title: Stellar Travel UI
long: A complete travel booking UI with immersive 3D room previews and itinerary generator.

title: AR Product Viewer
long: A product viewer with AR-like interaction and configurator.

title: DataViz Dash
long: Visualization dashboards with 3D charts and real-time updates.

title: Game Landing
long: Landing page with animated 3D hero and parallax.

title: Portfolio CMS
long: A headless CMS with live preview and deploy hooks.
